sentence.Network_en: Thomas, of course, was cool and aloof and imperturbable.
sentence.Network_cn: 当然，托马斯沉着、冷漠，不易激动。

sentence.Network_en: Wu Sun - fu listened attentively, while his eyes scanned Tu Weiyueh's imperturbable face.
sentence.Network_cn: 吴荪甫很注意地听着, 眼光在屠维岳那冷静的脸上打圈子.

sentence.Network_en: Edward was a model of good temper and his equanimity imperturbable.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱德华是个典型的好性子,他总是沉着镇定.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... imperturbability 沉着 imperturbable 沉着的 imperturbably 泰然地.
猴哥2300--6 flashcards | Quizlet ... imperious 专横的，傲慢的 imperturbable 镇静的，泰然自若的 impervious 透不过的.
equanimity n. 镇定，沉着imperturbable adj. 冷静的，沉着的leisureliness n. 悠然，从容

list.abs: 沉着的英文翻译... ... 沉着应对 deal with something calmly 沉着镇定 be calm and imperturbable 沉着勇敢 be steady and brave.

after inside upheaval , it is important to fix on imperturbable things . their imperturbableness . their air that nothing has happened renews our guarantee .在经历了内心动荡之后，专心于一些让人冷静的事物尤其重要，这些事物不温不火，仿佛什么事也没有发生过的样子重新恢复了我们的安全感。
Nobody can imperturbable acceptance of the inevitable ., 没有人能够泰然的接受不可避免的事.

list.exp: 虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若
list.abs: Hitherto imperturbable , he now showed signs of alarm ., 虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若 , 但他现在表现出一些惊慌.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin imperturbabilis, from in- 'not' + perturbare (see perturb)

entry.tran: 不易激动的;沉着的;冷静的
entry.def: If you describe someone as imperturbable, you mean that they remain calm, even in disturbing or dangerous situations.

example.ex: Thomas, of course, was cool and aloof and imperturbable.
example.tran: 当然,托马斯沉着、冷漠,不易激动。

means.word_mean: 1. not easily perturbed or excited or upset; marked by extreme calm and composure;

sentences.sentence: "hitherto imperturbable, he now showed signs of alarm"

stems_affixes.word_buile: turb搅动,混乱+id表形容词→搅动的→混浊的
turb搅动,混乱+ulent多……的→adj.狂暴的,无秩序的
im不+perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+able……的→不受扰乱[影响]
disturb[v.扰乱,妨碍,使不安]+ance表名词→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
perturb[n.烦乱,扰乱]+ation表名词→n.动摇, 混乱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 骚动;强烈而不稳定的气流/水流

stems_affixes.word_buile: turb搅动,混乱+ine物,机器等→n.汽轮机,涡轮机
tur=turb搅动,混乱+moil翻腾→搅动,翻腾→混乱
dis分开+turb搅动,混乱→搅开了→搅乱了
